alert.note: Alert for Banner; Scotts Bluff (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 08 at 3:33PM CDT until July 08 at 4:15PM CDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cheyenne has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Scotts Bluff County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Northwestern Banner County in the Panhandle of Nebraska... Southeastern Goshen County in southeastern Wyoming... * Until 315 PM MDT. * At 233 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles south of Stegall, or 17 miles southwest of Scottsbluff, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Wildcat Hills Campground and Wildcat Hills State Recreation Area. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
